comments:
In Eclipse 3.0M8 with FTP webdav plugin,
when you open site explorer, click on the new site button and create a new FTP
site, there will be an error message popup which ask me to look at the log file.
Actually, the "target site" label is missing in 3.0M8 for team synchronization.

Below is the log message:

This was due to a classloading bug that has since been fixed
